Package org.jtrim2.swing.component

Class BasicTransformationProperty

java.lang.Object
org.jtrim2.swing.component.BasicTransformationProperty
public final class BasicTransformationProperty extends Object
Defines a convenient class for viewing the properties of a BasicTransformationModel as MutableProperty instances.

Thread safety

Methods of this class are safe to be accessed by multiple threads concurrently. Also, the returned properties respect the general contract of MutableProperty and PropertySource.

Synchronization transparency

Methods of this class are synchronization transparent.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • BasicTransformationProperty

      public BasicTransformationProperty(BasicTransformationModel model)
      Creates a BasicTransformationProperty whose properties are the view of the specified BasicTransformationModel. That is, modifications of the specified model will be visible from the properties of this BasicTransformationProperty.
      Parameters:
      model - the BasicTransformationModel whose properties are viewed. This argument cannot be null.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - thrown if the specified model is null

  • Method Details

    • offsetX

      public MutableProperty<Double> offsetX()
      Returns the offsetX property of the underlying BasicTransformationModel.

      The value of this property is never null.

      Returns:
      the offsetX property of the underlying BasicTransformationModel. This method never returns null.

    • zoomToFit

      public MutableProperty<Set<ZoomToFitOption>> zoomToFit()
      Returns the zoomToFitOptions property of the underlying BasicTransformationModel.

      The value of this property is can be null, if the underlying model is not currently in zoom to fit mode.

      Returns:
      the zoomToFitOptions property of the underlying BasicTransformationModel. This method never returns null.
